Hadrik Longtooth was a elder warrior of the Gray Wolf tribe and an agent of the Forsworn that lived on the Sword Coast North during the 15 century DR.
Hadrik detested the leaders of the Gray Wolf tribe that aligned his people with the Shadovar of returned Netheril.
In the , Hadrik worked alongside the Hero of Sleeping Dragon Bridge to strike out against the Gray Wolf Packmasters of Elder Rock. Some of the Gray Wolf tribes people had begun to worship Shar, the eternal enemy of Selûne, patron of werewolves. Hadrik and the adventurer recovered talismans of Shar and Selûne from the tribe members of Elder Rock, in order to launch a final assault against Gray Wolf Den.
Once they were ready, the Hero of Sleeping Dragon Bridget infiltrated Gray Wolf Den at Hadriks behest and slew the tribes leaders. Notable among the three tribal leaders was Ethraniev Marrowslake, the bloodthirsty barbarian that originally swore allegiance to the Prince of Shade Clariburnus Tanthul.
